Class ContactInformationFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ContactInformationFormatter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContactInformationFormatter

    public class ContactInformationFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IContactInformationFormatter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContactInformationFormatter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void formatContactInformation(java.lang.String fileName)
      format the contact information in one file reads in each line of the file, tries to format each, and catches then handles the exception thrown if the information is not properly formatted
      void formatEmail(java.lang.String email)
      formats one email address checks if email is properly formatted.
      void formatName(java.lang.String name)
      format one name checks if name is properly formatted, if yes, prints it out, if not, throws NameFormatException
      void formatPhoneNumber(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
      format one phone number checks if phone number is properly formatted, prints if yes, throws PhoneNumberFormatException if not
      void readContactInformation(java.lang.String[] filePaths)
      read contact information from a list of files, given file paths loops through the files, storing lines as strings to be used in the formatter

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

                 throws EmailAddressFormatException
        formats one email address checks if email is properly formatted. If yes, prints out email. if not, throws EmailFormatException
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Throws:
